---
title: "Queue Model- Bed forecasting"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}

install.packages("utilities")


library(tidyverse)
lambda <- 5 # avg number of arrivals per day
K <- 100 # users of the facility
ARRIVE <- cumsum(rexp(K, rate = 1/lambda))

mu <- 1440

use_time <- mu * runif(K)

library(utilities)
QUEUE <- queue(arrive = ARRIVE, use.full = use_time,
                n = 20)

plot(QUEUE)
```
